About This Page

The "Manage Groups" page displays a list of all groups the currently logged in user is the owner of. This page is assembled to allow the user to edit existing groups and manage their members and requests to join the group.

It makes use of the following function:

  • Friends:Groups with type="owner" parameter to display a list of all groups the currently logged in user owns.
